class.name: EditorSceneImporterAssetImport
class.description:
This is multi-format asset importer.
Use these FBX Export settings from Maya.
[codeblock] * Binary format in FBX 2013 * Smoothing Groups * Smooth Mesh * Bake Animation * Resample All * Deformed Models * Skins * Blend Shapes * Curve Filters * Constant Key Reducer * Auto Tangents Only * DO NOT CHECK Constraints (Will Break File) * DO NOT CHECK Embed Media * Units: Centimeters * Up Axis: Y [/codeblock]
